title: Trent Dilfer on Rodgers, Hope for Winston, and More From NFL Week 1, Plus CFB Observations
description:
Ryen opens with his takeaways from the big results from Week 1 in the NFL, including Aaron Rodgers and the Packers getting blown out, the Bills losing to the Steelers, and the Dolphins winning in New England (00:29). Then, he chats with Super Bowl champion Trent Dilfer about the Rodgers-Packers problems, Jameis Winston’s huge game, and why even in a loss he’s impressed by the Browns (13:04). Next, Ryen runs through some observations from the college football weekend (53:34) before closing it out with some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (66:58).
Host: Ryen Russillo
Guests: Trent Dilfer
Producers: Steve Ceruti and Stefan Anderson
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
